title: Attention Photoshop Masters!
body:
*Disclaimer: This post contains spoilers for the season 4 finale of **Once Upon A Time** (yes, really). View at your own risk.
TLDR at end.*

As any Oncer knows the Dark One's dagger has the name of the person who holds it's power on it, which will change as the power gets transferred to another person. In the season 4 finale a lot of stuff happened which resulted in what is, in my opinion, the best photo of the dagger (Below). Basically, I want to change the name but can't do it myself. For now change the name from "Emma Swan" to my summoner name "SparksElm" but without it looking out of place. I will pay using in-game currency (RP) for someone who manages to achieve this and will probably want another done (which can be discussed further when it comes to it).

TLDR - Look at picture below. Replace the writing "Emma Swan" with my summoner name "SparksElm". In-game currency provided for ideal outcome.

https://www.facebook.com/OnceABC/photos/pb.168914433164059.-2207520000.1432174855./815959698459526/?type=3&theater

replies.body: Here is another option for you, I haven't watched the show so i don't know the exact specifications of the text but here is my attempt.

Looks to me like you got the text right. Well mostly, I think the E could use a bit of work (or is that just not showing up properly?). One other thing, the bit around the first S looks like it could do with a little touch up, I can still see some of the outlines of the original E (more so at the bottom).
Is this any better?
Yeh, looks good. Might leave it at a mystery chest for now (I'll sort out more) and discuss more (including maybe doing another) tomorrow if you don't mind.
Let me know if you want me to do anything more :)
Ok cool :) my main account is Itachi Uchiha btw add me on that, Lord Sesshomaru is just the one i use for boards haha
Not the best but the best you will get :p Sorry about the bad hand writing though :c i didn't try that hard but..
The image doesn't seem to be working, just says "This image failed to load" when I click on it.
do you have Skype i could send it to or maybe something else like that...
hopefully that works, oh and btw i hand wrote your name :/
You're right when you say it's not the best. I reckon that's worth a mystery chest though.
thanks man
Well. Give me about 20 minutes and i'll see what I can do.
Let me know how you like it. Been a while since i've done text edits.
It seems I missed an S, back to the drawing board for a minute.
It looks alright, even with the missing S (which I'm honestly not too fussed about for this). It's mystery chest worthy at least.
aaaand version 2.0, with added S.

Here you go!
If you wouldn't mind could you gift a mystery skin chest thing instead please?
Thank You :)
Could be better but I don't mind doing a mystery chest for the effort. I'll send you a friend request and send it after the one day waiting period for gifting.
pretty sure hes not gonna give rp lol
I've paid for similar requests before.
probs xD thats why we make them shit and not try :D ez ggwp

> [{quoted}](name=RLG Shaky,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=0agQxjG5,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2015-05-21T05:54:01.474+0000)
>
> probs xD thats why we make them shit and not try :D ez ggwp

Lel
I was making mine as a joke though
now cough up the RP
Mines better.
I think mine is the best

http://i.gyazo.com/2816dc3c8f964cf7a8d8dc0adec6b208.png

I am very caring so I did it for free.
